item.title: Report E-2025040217
item.description:
Report E-2025040217

Identified by scraper @ 2025-05-09T12:25:20+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-03-12
  • City: BRUNSWICK
  • State: ME
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: IRVING OIL TERMINALS INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: Yes
  • Description: Vehicle left the road and overturned, damaging cargo tank on ledge. Product flowed out of tank until 3rd party cleanup contractor, Clean Harbors, arrived approximately 3 hours later. Clean Harbors evacuated the remained of the product and recovered any recoverable spilled oil. Removed contaminated soil and installed monitoring wells on site, which will be monitored for 1 year. 5/7/2025 - Damage was more than $500. However, we do not have a total number for damage yet because repairs and remediation are still taking place.
